metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8696 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Improper removal of sensitive information before storage or transfer in some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosure via local access. Ezra Caltum, Joseph Nuzman, Nir Shildan and Ofir Joseff discovered that some Intel(R) Processors did not properly remove sensitive information before storage or transfer in some situations. A local attacker could possibly use this to expose sensitive information.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Ezra Caltum, Joseph Nuzman, Nir Shildan and Ofir Joseff

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
